subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels have pulled their eight-year offer to the free-agent first baseman Mark Teixeira, the team spokesman Tim Mead confirmed. The Angels reportedly made an offer worth about $160 million during the winter meetings earlier this month.
